Description:
Key AccountabilitiesExpertise on installing, configuring, managing, monitoring and troubleshooting SQL Server 2008/2008 R2/2012/2014/2019/2022
Installing SQL Server Stand-alone and clustered instances as per CIS Standards.
Strong knowledge on Windows Failover cluster and Configuration of SQL failover cluster, SQL Always-On Feature with best Industry standards.
Upgrading/Migrating SQL Servers from Old version to New Version which is latest.
Apply the Latest SP\CU Patches on SQL Servers across all versions.
Worked on design High Availability and DR options.
Standardize all the servers and implemented best hardening practices.
Query optimizing and Performance Tuning, using Performance Monitor, SQL Profiler and other related monitoring and troubleshooting tools.
Fixing linked server issues and permission issues on object level.
Worked on Rebuild indexing and update statics, Integrity check of database.Other AccountabilitiesUsing Scripting language like PowerShell, VBScript for Alerts and managing the SQL Database baselines.
Strong experience in mentoring team members and writing documentation.
Can build the SQL Servers Inventory, DB Inventory, patching status, other reports which is Management required to know.
Can manage MS SQL Server on Linux platform.
Expertise in designing the new Database Servers based on business requirements.
Expertise in Capacity planning for the database environment.
Created Linked Servers between SQL Server & Oracle Database systems.
Hands on experience in Database Backup and Recovery procedures.
Checking the status of Backup troubleshooting the failed backups and Restoration of databases
Perform scheduled maintenance and support release deployment activities after office hours.
Use of extended events to capture the DDL events on the Database.
24 X 7 Production Database on Call Support.Skills
Skills: Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science or equivalent
